title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.5 - Petition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.5 - Petition

State Regulations
A "petition" is a pleading filed to commence a proceeding
before the Board, and which must allege that an order, determination, rule, or
regulation issued by the Commissioner of Labor is invalid or
unreasonable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.5

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

Time periods prescribed by statute cannot be
extended. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
